summary: A collection of patches that add support for mods such as Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade, ClothingCraft, MorrowLoot Ultimate, and Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade to a variety of mod-added equipment.
descriptionHtml:
Find a mod that adds some neat equipment, but its stats and keywords don't line up with what [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34093/?]Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade[/url] uses for similar gear? Do you use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66105/?]MorrowLoot Ultimate[/url], but have Daedric gear from a mod that doesn't adhere to MLU's stricter crafting conditions? Did you download some beautiful clothing, only to find if it's craftable at all it's made of old mummy wrappings? Or perhaps you use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49791/?]Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade[/url] and just want to be able to hide mod-added recipes as well as vanilla recipes of a certain category. This is where I will share my work on correcting these inconsistencies.

I have been creating such patches for several mods. Here is what I have ready so far:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50339/?]Morrowind Armor - Netch Leather[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5226693/?]THusky[/url]

Replacer plugin (requires original mod for models and textures). Includes support for Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade, Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade, MorrowLoot Ultimate, and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url], and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch[/url]. Uses new injected records for Boiled Netch Leather and Netch Leather Strips. Has an installation option to disable masked helmets to prevent issues with backpacks and other accessories.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72963/?]Seph's Armour[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/9684468/?]sepharis[/url]

Includes support for Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade, Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade, MorrowLoot Ultimate, and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67176/?]ClothingCraft[/url]. In the ClothingCraft version, cotton is incorporated into the cuirass recipe. If you use ClothingCraft you can also choose to have the armor be made of a unique ingredient, Porcelain, which uses an injected record.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52112/?]Silk coat armor[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1067773/?]nouserhere[/url]

Includes support for Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade, Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade, and ClothingCraft. In the ClothingCraft version, the armor is mainly crafted from silk.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27563/?]Wet and Cold[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2463371/?]isoku[/url]

Includes support for Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43053/?]Clothing and Clutter Fixes[/url], Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade, MorrowLoot Ultimate, and ClothingCraft. Includes optional support Wet and Cold - Ashes. In the ClothingCraft version, all equipment added by Wet and Cold is craftable: cloaks, hoods, gloves, knapsacks, etc.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35813/?]Assassins Armor Set[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/929564/?]H4lfD3ad[/url]

Replacer plugin (requires original mod for models and textures). Includes support for Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade and Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade. No longer replaces the appearance of vanilla Shrouded Armor. Crafted from CCOR's injected Dark Leather (recommended to get the Dark Leather texture from CCOR or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16438/?]Bandoliers - Bags and Pouches[/url] or your Dark Leather will be purple). Incorporated into the Dark Brotherhood matching set, so can form a matching set with itself or mixed with Shrouded Armor.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78293/?]Colovian Fur Armor[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7402811/?]steelfeathers[/url]

Includes support for Clothing and Clutter Fixes, Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade, and ClothingCraft. Can be crafted with recipes that require leather, fur/pelts, and if ClothingCraft is installed, linen.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55596/?]Karliah's Dagger[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2643437/?]GyntRyles
[/url]
Replacer plugin (requires original mod for models and textures). Includes support for Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade and Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade. Karliah's Dagger is now a silver weapon. You can craft your own Silver Elven Dagger when you advance far enough in the Thieves Guild questline, provided you are a skilled enough smith. Includes the installation option to replace Karliah's leveled dagger with the dagger from this mod.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32458/?]Konahriks Accoutrements - Dragon Priest Armory[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2718519/?]edhelsereg[/url]

Includes support for Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade, Clothing and Clutter Fixes, Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade, MorrowLoot Ultimate, ClothingCraft, and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64283/?]Immersive Jewelry[/url]. Changes keywords and stats to rebalance Dragon Priest armor to fit better with WAFR, and changes some crafting materials to fit better with CCOR. Like WAFR's change to Morokei's mask, provides some Dragon Priest equipment for unarmored characters. With the ClothingCraft option, all cloth recipes use silk instead of Linen Wraps. If you use my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72849/?]Konahriks Accoutrements CACO patch[/url], load that patch after this one.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8429/?]Interesting NPCs[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1102501/?]kristakahashi[/url]

Includes support for Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade, Clothing and Clutter Fixes,Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade, MorrowLoot Ultimate, ClothingCraft, and Immersive Jewelry. Adds custom appearances for special equipment added by the mod, and recipes for reproducing this equipment inspired by CCOR's new recipes. It is not necessary to use the Interesting NPCs Clothing and Clutter Fixes patch with this patch. There is the additional option to give more items custom appearances from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2494522/?]crazylion[/url]'s [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52506/?]Ebony Blade[/url] (use the standalone version) and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10258480/?]LorSakyamuni[/url]'s [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55189/?]Ancient Elven Dagger[/url]. The meshes and textures from these mods must be installed for this option to work correctly, but the esps need not be activated. The ClothingCraft and Immersive Jewelry options are separate files, but can be merged into a Bashed or Smash Patch. If you use my Interesting NPCs CACO patch, load that after 3DNPC CCOR.esp. Extra thanks to all the modders who gave permission to use their custom assets. Please take a look at their excellent work linked to in the credits below.

Each file comes with its own FOMOD installer allowing you to pick the options you want. This way, most of these patches can be condensed into one plugin with all the options you selected. In addition, these patches should have no problems being merged by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3900618/?]matortheeternal[/url]'s [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69905/?]Merge Plugins[/url] utility. For more information on each file and its options, see its section in the readme tab, or simply download it and see the options in the installer for yourself. I also packaged readmes with each file. This is my second upload and the first using FOMOD installers, I take time to ensure my installers work as intended but please let me know if there's something I missed.

There are several other patches I'm working on now or plan to soon begin working on, and others I am still waiting for permission for. You are welcome to PM me or post on this mod page with feedback, including any other mods you'd like to see patched.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63193/?]Draugr Weaponry[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/330419/?]destero[/url]

Includes support for Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade and Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade. Adds keywords to the weapons, CCOR option conditions to the recipes, and adds breakdown and Draugr-smithing-learning recipes for all the weapons.

Credits:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4147439/?]Sharlikran[/url], ElminsterAU and others for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]TES5Edit[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3900618/?]matortheeternal[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49373/?]Automation Tools for TES5Edit[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/848320/?]XunAmarox[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39434/?]NMM Installer Tutorial - FOMOD - FOMM[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1850398/?]gandaganza[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64128/?]The Master Guide to FOMOD Installers[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4291352/?]Kryptopyr[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49791/?]Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43053/?]Clothing and Clutter Fixes[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34093/?]Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade[/url], and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63354/?]Disparity[/url]

files.name: Patches for Seph's Armour
files.changelogHtml: Interesting NPCs patch: Added custom Brittle Bone Axe and Axe of Forgotten Kings, Heavy Gabania Guard Armor, and cloaks for the Blood of Skyrim and Gabania factions. Improved/corrected a few textures and environment maps.
